channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thank You To All The Men Who Voted ‘For My Daughter’
item.description: Men did 'step up' for their daughters and for women everywhere, but not in the way that these sobbing women on Instagram demanded.

item.title: Trump Should End On-Camera White House Press Briefings In His Second Term
item.description: Can the on-camera briefings. Trump doesn't need them. Neither do the rest of us.

item.title: '4B' movement: Liberal women launch sex strike after Trump win
item.description: A number of feminists are going on a sex strike in retaliation for Donald Trump's presidential victory.

item.title: You Did This to Yourselves, Democrats
item.description: Democrats made a lot of bad choices that drove voters away. That’s how ordinary Americans ended up bringing back Donald Trump.

item.title: Democrats Couldn’t Get Away With 2020-Style Election Shenanigans In 2024 Thanks To The Election Integrity Movement
item.description: Donald Trump won in a landslide in part because Republicans and conservatives mobilized like never before to ensure free and fair elections.

item.title: Robot artist Ai-Da’s portrait of Alan Turing shatters auction records selling for over $1 million—a first for AI artwork
item.description: A portrait of English mathematician Alan Turing became the first artwork by a humanoid robot to be sold at auction.
